title: looking for female flatmate.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


genuine easygoing guy with morals and  integrity.

looking for a decent female to move in and share my place with me.

have tried in past, but met some very manipulative conniving females.
i am no fool and nor am i desperate.

if you are serious please send a basic bio with a picture.

i will  not  respond to entitled people messaging me 101 questions without following my request.

make your own ad.

i have met a lot if timewasters, so please don't percieve me as rude.

im not.

am easy to get on with, and if your decent you will like living  with me.

open to offers.
